name: Rogue
shortDescription: Skilled infiltrators and precision strikers who rely on agility, stealth, and cunning.
description: Rogues rely on skill, stealth, and their foes’ vulnerabilities to get the upper hand in any situation. They excel at dealing precise damage and avoiding danger.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one skill proficiency and your proficiency with thieves’ tools. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll or an ally is adjacent to the target.

features.name: Thieves’ Cant
features.description: You know the secret language of thieves, allowing you to convey hidden messages.

features.name: Cunning Action
features.description: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

subclass.label: Roguish Archetype
subclass.description: Choose a roguish archetype that defines your methods and talents.

features.name: Steady Aim
features.description: As a bonus action, you can give yourself advantage on your next attack roll this turn, provided you haven’t moved.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Uncanny Dodge
features.description: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack’s damage.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two more of your skill proficiencies or thieves’ tools to gain Expertise.

features.name: Evasion
features.description: You take no damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw, and only half damage on a failure.

features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Roguish Archetype Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your chosen roguish archetype.

features.name: Reliable Talent
features.description: Whenever you make an ability check that lets you add your proficiency bonus, you treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

features.name: Blindsense
features.description: You can effectively perceive hidden or invisible creatures within 10 feet.

features.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

features.description: No attack roll has advantage against you while you aren’t incapacitated.
